document.full_text: irish band u2's current 360 world tour is the most successful ever, beating the record set by the rolling stones four years ago, promoters live nation entertainment said on monday.
document.title: u2 beats rolling stones record for biggest-grossing tour
lines_and_colors: irish band u2's current 360 world tour is the most successful ever, beating the record set by the rolling stones four years ago, promoters live nation entertainment said on monday.
